title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Science Leadership Competency Enhancement Course Based on Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles of the third-generation distance education model (cognitivism, social constructivism, and connectivism) and apply them to work contexts
Learners can complete a peer leadership case analysis project using collaborative learning tools (real-time chat, cloud documents, etc.) in mobile environments
Learners can develop and implement strategies for building open online networks for sharing knowledge in scientific fields

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
